Author: Chimalis#2318
Content:
Hello my funds on my Agama wallet was hacked by Komodo. I filled the claim formular and got this message. 
||Hello,

I'm contacting you regarding your KMD claim. You need to send any funds from your old compromised address to your refund address which you mentioned in your claim. Please let me know as soon as you do that and we will process your refund manually.

Hope you will complete the necessary steps as soon as you can. If you need assistance, please join our discord server https://komodoplatform.com/discord and ask in #support channel.

Best regards,

SHossain
Support Manager
Komodo Platform||

Author: Chimalis#2318
Content: what are the next steps i have to do to got my KMD back?

Content: he didn't get any smartdust

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: @Chimalis you still have funds in your compromised address. just send them to your specified refund address

Content: Ah i have to send the 0.44 KMD to the new address, that the balance on the old address is 0?

Content: just send them to your specified refund address
